welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weert, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic buildings, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
